div.p: This is the base conformance statement for FHIR. It represents a server that provides the none of the functionality defined by FHIR. It is provided to use as a template for system designers to build their own conformance statements from. A conformance profile has to contain something, so this contains a read of a Conformance Statement

description.value: This is the base conformance statement for FHIR. It represents a server that provides the none of the functionality defined by FHIR. It is provided to use as a template for system designers to build their own conformance statements from. A conformance profile has to contain something, so this contains a read of a Conformance Statement
This is the conformance statement to declare that the server supports SMART-on-FHIR. See the SMART-on-FHIR docs for the extension that would go with such a server
